entry.def: A greenhouse is a glass building in which you grow plants that need to be protected from bad weather.

entry.tran: 温室效应的；引起温室效应的
entry.def: Greenhouse means relating to or causing the greenhouse effect.

means.word_mean: 1. a building with glass walls and roof; for the cultivation and exhibition of plants under controlled conditions
1. of or relating to or caused by the greenhouse effect;

Sentence.sentence: Left alone, it was assumed, the world's rain forests would not only flourish but might even rescue us from disaster by absorbing the excess carbon dioxide and other planet-warming greenhouse gases.
billion metric tons of carbon into the atmosphere each year - making forests the leading source of greenhouse gases

More than paradise lost, a perishing rain forest could trigger a domino effect - sending winds and rains kilometers off course and loading the skies with even greater levels of greenhouse gases - that will be felt far beyond the Amazon basin.

sentences.en: Behind the green house was a greenhouse.
sentences.cn: 在那所绿房子后面是一个花房。

sentences.en: The tomatoes were grown in the greenhouse.
sentences.cn: 这些西红柿是在温室栽培的。
